title.rendered: May 2024 Client of the Month: Ebonics International Ltd

content.rendered:
This month we spoke to Jeffrey, Managing Director of Ebonics International Ltd!

Ebonics International | Instagram

Hey Jeffrey! Tell us about your business

Ebonics International operates a juice manufacturing company, and we also trade as Ebonics Solution to provide marketing, signage, IT consulting, and business solutions.

What drove you to start your business?

Consultancy experience made me want to venture outside my 9 to 5 and provide some expertise on the side. The juicing side of the company was driven by a sample, and the logic of putting money where my youth was. After trying the juice once at a stall and praising it, I decided to dive into producing the beverage.

What particular challenges did you have to overcome in setting up your business, and since then?

The juicing side of the company requires funding in order to achieve any scalability. The raw material is cheaper in bigger quantities but also occupies a considerable amount of space. The struggle is always finding the sweet spot between cost of material and profitable sales price.

Why did you choose The Accountancy Partnership?

I read of them online and looked into the details. Based on my previous experiences I knew I needed an accountant that would be on top of the accounting without me chasing them up.

Have we helped you overcome any challenges, and if so, how?

Deadlines and deductions are now not a problem. The most valuable piece of work is the knowledge gaps that The Accountancy Partnership not only covers with plenty of videos and manuals, but also with prompt responses to my inquiries.

What do you have planned for your business in future?

Growth and expansion!

 
Learn more about our online accounting services for businesses just like Lafras. Call 020 3355 4047 or get an instant online quote.
